name: Egghead (Covertape version)
overview: The aim of the game is to collect all the keys on the screen avoiding enemies, spikes and platform jumping death falls. Egghead can only progress to the next level once all objects are picked up. The game contains a total of 40 screens. Egghead has only four lives. Time is limited too. Released on the Crash Magazine issue 73: Presents 9 Covertape.
